title: Rubio heads to Caribbean as Trump’s Iran gambit nears tipping point
summary_full: Marco Rubio is attending a regional summit to emphasize the Trump administration’s focus on the Western Hemisphere even as conflict in the Middle East looms.
summary_public: Marco Rubio is attending a regional summit to emphasize the Trump administration’s focus on the Western Hemisphere even as conflict in the Middle East looms.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Trump’s Iran gambit nears tipping point
